name: (A)steroids
description:
Intense and beatable.

A fast paced game of acceleration, patterns and Death Crystals.

Dodge the asteroids long enough to beat the game.

If you like high speed obstacle dodging games this one might be for you.

Use the cats roll as an indication for your position across the width of the path.

Finding the right passage through each asteroid pattern is key.

The glow shows that you might collide.
